SENT.plain: Burkitt's lymphoma is a poorly differentiated rare and aggressive type of non-Hodgkin's lymphoma
This article reports the case of a male child aged seven years, who was examined at the Odontopediatric Clinic of the UFRN Dentistry Department
The patient presented a tumor in the premolar region of the mandible; teeth were mobile in this region
Radiology revealed a diffuse radioluscent area which was diagnosed histopathologically as Burkitt's lymphoma
The patient was treated with polychemotherapy; complete remission of the disease was attained
